articles.description: Members of the Council for the Order of Australia have spoken out about Margaret Court's controversial honour.
articles.content:
Margaret Court and Rod Laver at the 2015 Australian Open. (Photo by Graham Denholm/Getty Images)
Margaret Courts controversial Australia Day honour was reportedly awarded to address a disparity betw… [+4202 chars]
